name: Slap City 3: Rampass Inc.
description:
A sequel to the sequel https://krogh.itch.io/slapcity2 to the big game https://krogh.itch.io/slapcity (not to be confused with that one on steam). 

Slap City 3 sends you on a vendetta against a corrupt company.

Complete with an epic boss fight, if you make it that far.

A game by Marcus Krogh
